name: txt_press
desc: PRESS: Make PRESS F2 <property> to do something upon pressing F. Only some properties, like :(, will work!

name: txt_f2
desc: F2: Make PRESS F2 <property> to do something upon pressing F. Only some properties, like :(, will work!

name: txt_2edit
desc: 2EDIT: Make PRESS F2 2EDIT to unlock the level editor by pressing F2!
